name: Cutta'Head
description:
A thrilling journey through the Earth's crust.

Screwhead makes his debut in his special suit  and cutterhead head to fulfill the contract to make it through the Earth's crust. Can he finally prove that a human can drill to the Earth's mantle using only a super-advanced science fiction suit and a magical drilling hat? Will that be enough to impress his estranged father? Only time will tell.

This project was developed in the Godot Engine for the 2019 Coolmath Game Jam Contest; theme "Use Your Head." It is the first official game by Rexatron, a game studio made by a husband and wife with too little time on their hands.
